name: denumerably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can be counted: denumerably infinite A denumerably infinite number of product variants is considered. König proved that the cardinality of the continuum cannot be the sum of denumerably many smaller cardinals.
More examplesFewer examplesIn this section, D has a denumerably infinite state space.Such a process is a Markov chain with a denumerably infinite number of states.It can be shown that the set of all pairs of natural numbers is denumerably infinite.
